ai-tha-ap264:1.2_0: the one who attains Nibbāna before.
ai-tha-ap264:2.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap264:2.2_0: It was enough for you to put on the idea.
ai-tha-ap264:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap264:2.4_0: This is the fruit of good.
ai-tha-ap264:3.1_0: An eon of the other four eons.
ai-tha-ap264:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṅgiya.
ai-tha-ap264:6.1_0: Seeing the second of the ladies of the Elder Nuns,
